TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ContentType extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 MIME 通訊協定內容類型標頭。

span.span: Represents a MIME protocol Content-Type header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的資訊類別用來描述包含在電子郵件訊息的方式顯示電子郵件的軟體在適當的方式中會有內容中的資料。The information in the class is used to describe the data contained in an email message in such a way that software that displays email can present the content in an appropriate manner. 搭配使用附件中指定的內容類型的類別。 is used with the class to specify the type of content in the attachment. Content-type 標頭的語法是在 RFC 2045 5.1 節中所述。The syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1. RFC 2046 提供 MIME 媒體類型和其參數的詳細的資訊。RFC 2046 provides detailed information about MIME media types and their parameters. 這些 Rfc 位於[ http://www.ietf.org ](http://www.ietf.org/)。These RFCs are available at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會傳送附件的電子郵件訊息，並顯示附件的內容。The following code example sends an email message with an attachment and displays the properties for the attachment. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#6)]

param.span: ，例如 "text/plain; charset=us-ascii"，其中包含 MIME 媒體類型、子類型和選擇性的參數。

span.span: A , for example, "text/plain; charset=us-ascii", that contains the MIME media type, subtype, and optional parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 語法`contentType`字串 RFC 2045 一節所述 5.1 位於[ http://www.ietf.org ](http://www.ietf.org/)。The syntax of the `contentType` string is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1 available at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫這個建構函式。The following code example demonstrates how to call this constructor. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Boundary { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定界限參數值，其包含在這個執行個體所表示的內容類型標頭中。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the boundary parameter included in the Content-Type header represented by this instance.
A that contains the value associated with the boundary parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在下列範例中的 Content-type 標頭的值參數是"`-----boundary---0`"。In the following example of a Content-Type header, the value of the parameter is "`-----boundary---0`". `content-type: multipart/mixed; boundary=-----boundary---0` 將此屬性設定為`null`或移除標頭中的界限資訊。Set this property to `null` or to remove the boundary information from the header. Content-type 標頭的語法是在 RFC 2045 5.1 節中所述。The syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1. 深入討論界限參數被包含在 RFC 2046 第 5.1.1 節。An in-depth discussion of the boundary parameter is contained in RFC 2046 Section 5.1.1. 這些 Rfc 位於[ http://www.ietf.org ](http://www.ietf.org/)。These RFCs are available at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的值屬性。The following code example displays the value of the property. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CharSet { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定字元集參數值，其包含在這個執行個體所表示的內容類型標頭中。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the charset parameter included in the Content-Type header represented by this instance.

value.span: ，包含與字元集參數關聯的值。

span.span: A that contains the value associated with the charset parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在下列範例中的 Content-type 標頭的值屬性是 「`us-ascii`"。In the following example of a Content-Type header, the value of the property is "`us-ascii`". `content-type: application/x-myType; charset=us-ascii` 將此屬性設定為`null`或移除 charset 資訊從標頭。Set this property to `null` or to remove the charset information from the header. 文法的詳細資料的內容類型標頭的語法是在 RFC 2045 5.1 節中所述。A grammar that details the syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1. Charset 參數的深入討論被包含在 RFC 2046 4.1.2 節。An in-depth discussion of the charset parameter is contained in RFC 2046 Section 4.1.2. 這些 Rfc 位於[ http://www.ietf.org ](http://www.ietf.org/)。These RFCs are available at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示屬性的值。The following code example displays the value of the property. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MediaType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定媒體類型值，其包含在這個執行個體所表示的內容類型標頭中。

span.span: Gets or sets the media type value included in the Content-Type header represented by this instance.
A that contains the media type and subtype value.

value.span: 這個值未包含接在子類型後面的分號 (;) 分隔符號。

span.span: This value does not include the semicolon (;) separator that follows the subtype.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在下列範例中的 Content-type 標頭的值屬性是`"application/x-myType"`。In the following example of a Content-Type header, the value of the property is `"application/x-myType"`. `content-type: application/x-myType; name=data.xyz` 將此屬性設定為`null`或移除標頭的名稱資訊。Set this property to `null` or to remove the name information from the header. Content-type 標頭的語法是在 RFC 2045 5.1 節中所述。The syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1. RFC 2046 提供 MIME 媒體類型的詳細的資訊。RFC 2046 provides detailed information on MIME media types. 這些 Rfc 位於[ http://www.ietf.org ](http://www.ietf.org/)。These RFCs are available at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定這個屬性的值。The following code example sets the value of this property. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定名稱參數值，其包含在這個執行個體所表示的內容類型標頭中。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the name parameter included in the Content-Type header represented by this instance.
A that contains the value associated with the name parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在下列範例中的 Content-type 標頭的值屬性是`"data.xyz"`。In the following example of a Content-Type header, the value of the property is `"data.xyz"`. `content-type: application/x-myType; name=data.xyz` 詳細資料的內容類型標頭的語法文法 RFC 2045 一節所述 5.1 中，位於[ http://www.ietf.org ](http://www.ietf.org/)。A grammar that details the syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1, available at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/). 指定的內容時為或，您可以使用設定的收件者的系統儲存內容的檔案名稱。When specifying content for a as a or , you can use to set the name of the file that stores the content on the recipient's system. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定指定要做為資料流附加檔案的名稱屬性的值。The following code example sets the value of the property to specify a name for a file being attached as a stream. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#15](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#15)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#15)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parameters As StringDictionary

summary.span: 取得包含參數的字典，這些參數包含在這個執行個體所表示的內容類型標頭中。

span.span: Gets the dictionary that contains the parameters included in the Content-Type header represented by this instance.

value.span: 可寫入的 ，包含名稱和值組。

span.span: A writable that contains name and value pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以藉由指定的整個內容標頭值建構時設定參數物件，或您可以加入參數，以便傳回屬性。You can set the parameters by specifying the entire Content-Header value when constructing a object or you can add parameters to the returned by the property. 將參數項目加入至字典中，參數的名稱是項目的索引鍵和參數的值則是項目的值。When adding a parameter entry to the dictionary, the name of the parameter is the entry's key and the value of the parameter is the entry's value. 文法的詳細資料的內容類型標頭的語法是在 RFC 2045 5.1 節中所述。A grammar that details the syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1. RFC 2046 MIME 媒體類型，以及其相關聯的參數提供的詳細的資訊。RFC 2046 provides detailed information on MIME media types and their associated parameters. 這些 Rfc 位於[ http://www.ietf.org ](http://www.ietf.org/)。These RFCs are available at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示值，這個屬性所傳回之字典中。The following code example displays the values in the dictionary returned by this property. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#5)]

summary.span: 傳回這個 物件的字串表示。

span.span: Returns a string representation of this object.
A that contains the current settings for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值方法包含用來建立此字串，如果有指定，而且沒有任何屬性值已變更。The value of the method contains the string used to create this , if one was specified and no property values have been changed. 如果未指定字串，或因為此變更一個或多個屬性值已建立的值是使用目前的屬性值由所組成的 Content-type 標頭格式的字串。If no string was specified, or one or more property values have changed since this was created, the value of is a string in the format of a Content-Type header that is composed using the current property values. 字串沒有包括`"Content-type:"`前置詞。The string does not include the `"Content-type:"` prefix. Content-type 標頭的語法 RFC 2045 一節所述 5.1 中，位於[ http://www.ietf.org ](http://www.ietf.org/)。The syntax of the Content-Type header is described in RFC 2045 Section 5.1, available at [http://www.ietf.org](http://www.ietf.org/). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的字串表示。The following code example displays the string representation of a . [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#13](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#13)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#13)]
